SEARCH
Package org.apache.commons.chain.web

Schnittstelle WebContext

Alle Superschnittstellen:
Context, Map<String,Object>, Serializable
Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
FacesWebContext, PortletWebContext, ServletWebContext, WebContextBase
public interface WebContext extends Context, Serializable
Extended Context that provides web based applications that use it a "generic" view of HTTP related requests and responses, without tying the application to a particular underlying Java API (such as servlets). It is expected that a concrete subclass of WebContext for each API (such as ServletWebContext) will support adapting that particular API's implementation of request and response objects into this generic framework.

The characteristics of a web request/response are made visible via a series of JavaBeans properties (and mapped to read-only attributes of the same name, as supported by Context.

Version:
$Revision$ $Date$
Autor:
Craig R. McClanahan

  • Methodendetails

    • getApplicationScope

      Map<String,Object> getApplicationScope()
      Return a mutable Map that maps application scope attribute names to their values.
      Gibt zurück:
      Application scope Map.

    • getHeader

      Map<String,String> getHeader()
      Return an immutable Map that maps header names to the first (or only) header value (as a String). Header names must be matched in a case-insensitive manner.
      Gibt zurück:
      Header values Map.

    • getHeaderValues

      Map<String,String[]> getHeaderValues()
      Return an immutable Map that maps header names to the set of all values specified in the request (as a String array). Header names must be matched in a case-insensitive manner.
      Gibt zurück:
      Header values Map.

    • getInitParam

      Map<String,String> getInitParam()
      Return an immutable Map that maps context application initialization parameters to their values.
      Gibt zurück:
      Initialization parameter Map.

    • getParam

      Map<String,String> getParam()
      Return an immutable Map that maps request parameter names to the first (or only) value (as a String).
      Gibt zurück:
      Request parameter Map.

    • getParamValues

      Map<String,String[]> getParamValues()
      Return an immutable Map that maps request parameter names to the set of all values (as a String array).
      Gibt zurück:
      Request parameter Map.

    • getCookies

      Map<String,Cookie> getCookies()
      Return an immutable Map that maps cookie names to the set of cookies specified in the request.
      Gibt zurück:
      Map of Cookies.
      Seit:
      Chain 1.1
